english: abaya (traditional full-length outer garment, most commonly for women, but also for men)
to take __ out of one’s pocket
What size shoes do you wear?
I’m not sure about my size.
to wear, to get dressed, to put on
What are you going to wear today?
He took a shower, got dressed, and left for work.
just right (not too loose or tight)
This shirt is wrinkled. I need to iron it.
a diamond ring, gold bracelet, and silver necklace
transliteration: xātim almās, iswāra dáhab, u 3áʔid fúɖɖa
arabic: خاتِم ألْماس، إسْوارة دهب وعقِد فُضّة
